name: Santa Infinite Fun
description:
Hey!
Do you want to know how it feels like to Fly High with Santa Claus in this free endless runner game?
Kids are waiting for their gifts on this Christmas, but what it looks like is Santa Clause has accidentally dropped the gifts on North Pole. You have to help Santa to collect gifts.
If you want to Fly on sleigh, survive the obstacles, collect the gifts for kids and above all if you want to be the part of Santa Claus's life then you are at right place.
Fly High with Santa Claus on this Christmas as we take good care all of this while making snow games for kids.

- A single tap to fly high and gift collection
- Interesting Power ups during the journey
- A speed car for Santa to catch the time
- Infinite fun with no limits, keep flying, keep collecting, keep enjoying snow games.

Best of Luck!
